com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.data

Class Bible

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic.Bible

  • public class Bible
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage the bible of a Bible, which governs everything else like the Books within, the number of chapters in a book, the number of verses in a chapter, and the language of the book.

      • getVersionInfo

        public void getVersionInfo(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
        Populates this Bible with data parsed from the XML response of the Bibles.org API to get the full information for the Bible. This includes all books and counts for verses and chapters in each book.
        Parameters:
        doc -

      • getAvailableVersions

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Bible> getAvailableVersions(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
        Parse the XML response from Bibles.org of available versions. The document can be recently downloaded or cached, and either file is parsed in exactly the same way
        Parameters:
        doc - a Jsoup Document containing the XML response to be parsed
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all available Versions, with the abbreviated name as a key
        See Also:
        Download.availableVersions(String, String)

      • getAvailableLanguages

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAvailableLanguages(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
        Parse the XML response from Bibles.org of available versions to determine all the available languages. The document can be recently downloaded or cached, and either file is parsed in exactly the same way
        Parameters:
        doc - a Jsoup Document containing the XML response to be parsed
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all available Versions, with the abbreviated name as a key
        See Also:
        Download.availableVersions(String, String)
